analysis.Summary: Vue 3 single-file component that displays the details of a reward object, including its type, amount and optional description.
analysis.Purpose: Serve as a presentational component in the governance module to render reward information in a consistent UI block.

Components.name: RewardDisplay
Components.responsibility: Accepts a `reward` prop and outputs its fields (type, amount, description) in a structured layout.

Functions.name: defineProps
Functions.purpose: Vue Composition API helper to declare and validate the `reward` prop.

analysis.Usage: Imported and used in parent components or views as `<RewardDisplay :reward="someRewardObject" />` to show reward data.
Notes: No local `<style>` sectionâ€”relies on global or parent styles for `.reward-display`.
